articles.title: Analysis: Jan. 6 hearing conjures chilling picture of future Trump tyranny
articles.description: As their final act nears, the House January 6 hearings have evolved from documenting a stain on history to warning of a violent and tyrannical future that awaits if Donald Trump is allowed to again unleash America's pent-up extremism.
